verses.name: Luke 20:33
verses.text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she? for seven had her to wife.

verses.name: Luke 20:34
verses.text: And Jesus answering said unto them, The children of this world marry, and are given in marriage:

verses.name: Luke 20:35
verses.text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world, and the resurrection from the dead, neither marry, nor are given in marriage:

verses.name: Luke 20:36
verses.text: Neither can they die any more: for they are equal unto the angels; and are the children of God, being the children of the resurrection.
